DOC.brief_summary: VEGF Trap-Eye test safety efficacy patient vision loss due choroidal neovascularization secondary pathologic myopia . This placebo-controlled trial . 3 4 patient receive injection VEGF Trap-Eye affect eye ( repeated injection require ) , 1 4 patient receive sham injection require needle stick , make patient unaware whether received active treatment . Outcome two treatment group compare 24 week . From week 24 , sham patient may receive active treatment . Total duration study 48 week .
